join_thousands: Join thousands of people who choose HopIn to carpool between cities.
driver_text: Drivers save an average of $250 every month by carpooling with HopIn. Share your seats and earn while helping others travel.
safe_rides_desc: We verify every driver's license so you ride with peace of mind.
super_easy_desc: Find a ride, book in minutes, and travel for less — all online.
be_a_driver_desc: Earn by sharing seats on trips you were already going to take.
no_trips: No trips available at the moment.
cta_heading: We’d love to have you carpool with us!
cta_text: Join thousands of people who share rides and travel smarter.
